title: Login screen black
body:
Hello together

Problem: As soon as i press "Launch", the league client appears. Altough I can hear the music, the client stays black. I can enter my username and password because of the sound of the "tab" button, but if i press enter, only the music stops, the client remains black and nothing other changes. I've been having this problem since i update the new client. I fixed it last patch by just deactivating one of my graphics cards (I play on a laptop with 2 graphics cards), this worked perfectly until the patch that appeared today. Now i have the exact same problem again. (I'm running Windows 10 btw.)

Things that I've tried:
- Reinstalling the client
- Reinstalling the Adobe Flash Player
- Use the "Repair" tool
- Run LeagueClient directly from C:/Riot Games/League of Legends
- Launch as administrator
- Changing the compatibility settings
- Launching with no sandbox parameter
- Updating my graphiccards
- Reactivating my second graphics card for League of Legends (the one i deactivatet last patch)

Also this is written in my debug file: 
[1122/194548:ERROR:gpu_video_decode_accelerator.cc(375)] HW video decode not available for profile 11

Searching for the answer has been very{{summoner:3}} ing, it would be really nice if someone could {{summoner:7}} my League of Legends.

{{champion:14}} ara

replies.body:
This could be caused by any number of different factors. Since you've specifically mentioned the display adapter fix from last patch, this may be caused by League not utilizing your right display adapter. Make sure your windows power settings are set properly using [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq6)

If you still experience this issue, let me know.

Thanks for replying
I've now set my windows power settings, however, the client is still black.

Hmmm. Since that quick change didn't resolve this issue, it's likely not related to the last issue you had. Most of the time, Black Screens within the client are caused by your computer being unable to establish a solid connection with our servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if those steps helped.
It didn't work, Im playing on the old client right now which works for me. But I guess it's going to get removed some day so Im still searching for a solution.

I'd recommend running some system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission so one of our tech specialists can work with you further troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I don't know if it helps but I have exactly the same issue with an other game and sometimes even with Youtube videos, but for the videos I can just open Youtube in a new tab and it's working again.
